languages.text: {n}Джай стоит над телами своих подчиненных — многие изуродованы до неузнаваемости, словно отряд редкостных истязателей трудился над ними в течение долгих станционных циклов. В правом кулаке хладная торговка сжимает Меркатум Табула Официале, и пергамент жалобно хрустит под ее пальцами.{/n} "Так было правильно... Правильно же?" {n}Сложно сказать, кого именно спрашивает Джай — себя или вас.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Джай стоит над телами своих подчиненных — многие изуродованы до неузнаваемости, словно отряд редкостных истязателей трудился над ними в течение долгих станционных цикло. В правом кулаке хладная торговка сжимает Меркатум Табула официале, и пергамент жалобно хрустит под ее пальцами.{/n} "Так было правильно... Правильно же?" {n}Сложно сказать, кого именно спрашивает Джай — себя или вас.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae stands over the bodies of her underlings — many of them have been mutilated beyond recognition, as though a troop of expert torturers had worked on them for many station cycles. Jae grips the Mercatum Tabula Officiale in her right hand and the parchment crunches in protest.{/n} "It was the right thing to do... Wasn't it?" {n}You cannot tell if Jae is asking herself or you.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ジェイは部下たちの遺体を見下ろして立つ。その多くは見分けがつかないほどに切り刻まれており、あたかも専門の拷問官の一団が何度も何度もそのサイクルをこなしたかのようだ。ジェイは右手でメルカトゥム・タビュラ・オフィシャルを握りしめる。羊皮紙が反発するかのようにバリバリと音を立てた。{/n}「あれで良かったんだ…よね？」{n}その問いは、ジェイ自身に尋ねたものなのか、それともあなたに尋ねたものなのかはわからなかった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae stands over the bodies of her underlings — many of them have been mutilated beyond recognition, as though a troop of expert torturers had worked on them for many station cycles. Jae grips the Mercatum Tabula Officiale in her right hand and the parchment crunches in protest.{/n} "It was the right thing to do... Wasn't it?" {n}You cannot tell if Jae is asking herself or you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイは部下たちの遺体を見下ろして立つ。その多くは見分けがつかないほどに切り刻まれており、あたかも専門の拷問官の一団が何度も何度もそのサイクルをこなしたかのようだ。ジェイは右手でメルカトゥム・タビュラ・オフィシャルを握りしめる。羊皮紙が反発するかのようにバリバリと音を立てた。{/n}「あれで良かったんだ…よね？」{n}その問いは、ジェイ自身に尋ねたものなのか、それともあなたに尋ねたものなのかはわからなかった。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}婕伊站在属下的尸体身边。他们之中许多人已经被折磨得面目全非，仿佛一群刑讯专家在他们身上一刻不停地动着刀子，持续了许多周期一样。婕伊右手紧紧攥着那张帝国官方行商执照，那张羊皮纸发出了咯吱咯吱的声响，仿佛在抗议一般。{/n}“我做的是正确的事情……没错吧？”{n}你分不清婕伊是在问自己，还是在问你。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae stands over the bodies of her underlings — many of them have been mutilated beyond recognition, as though a troop of expert torturers had worked on them for many station cycles. Jae grips the Mercatum Tabula Officiale in her right hand and the parchment crunches in protest.{/n} "It was the right thing to do... Wasn't it?" {n}You cannot tell if Jae is asking herself or you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊站在属下的尸体身边。他们之中许多人已经被折磨得面目全非，仿佛一群刑讯专家在他们身上一刻不停地动着刀子，持续了许多周期一样。婕伊右手紧紧攥着那张帝国官方行商执照，那张羊皮纸发出了咯吱咯吱的声响，仿佛在抗议一般。{/n}“我做的是正确的事情……没错吧？”{n}你分不清婕伊是在问自己，还是在问你。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae se yergue ante los cadáveres de sus subordinados. Muchos de ellos se hallaban tan mutilados que era imposible reconocerlos, como si una tropa de torturadores expertos hubiera hecho de las suyas con ellos durante estaciones y estaciones. Jae aprieta la Mercatum Tabula Officiale con la mano derecha y dicho pergamino cruje en señal de protesta.{/n} «Era lo correcto... ¿verdad?». {n}No distingues si Jae dirige esa pregunta a ti o a sí misma.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae stands over the bodies of her underlings — many of them have been mutilated beyond recognition, as though a troop of expert torturers had worked on them for many station cycles. Jae grips the Mercatum Tabula Officiale in her right hand and the parchment crunches in protest.{/n} "It was the right thing to do... Wasn't it?" {n}You cannot tell if Jae is asking herself or you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae se yergue ante los cadáveres de sus subordinados. Muchos de ellos se hallaban tan mutilados que era imposible reconocerlos, como si una tropa de torturadores expertos hubiera hecho de las suyas con ellos durante estaciones y estaciones. Jae aprieta la Mercatum Tabula Officiale con la mano derecha y dicho pergamino cruje en señal de protesta.{/n} «Era lo correcto... ¿verdad?». {n}No distingues si Jae dirige esa pregunta a ti o a sí misma.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae se tient devant les corps de ses associés. Une majorité d'entre eux a été rendue méconnaissable par les mutilations, comme si une armée de bourreau s'était acharnée sur eux durant de nombreux cycles de station. Dans la main droite de Jae, la Mercatum Tabula Officiale émet un froissement de protestation alors que sa poigne la broie sans merci.{/n} « J'ai fait ce qu'il fallait... N'est-ce pas ? » {n}Vous ne savez pas si cette question vous est vraiment destinée.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae stands over the bodies of her underlings — many of them have been mutilated beyond recognition, as though a troop of expert torturers had worked on them for many station cycles. Jae grips the Mercatum Tabula Officiale in her right hand and the parchment crunches in protest.{/n} "It was the right thing to do... Wasn't it?" {n}You cannot tell if Jae is asking herself or you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae se tient devant les corps de ses associés. Une majorité d'entre eux a été rendue méconnaissable par les mutilations, comme si une armée de bourreau s'était acharnée sur eux durant de nombreux cycles de station. Dans la main droite de Jae, la Mercatum Tabula Officiale émet un froissement de protestation alors que sa poigne la broie sans merci.{/n} « J'ai fait ce qu'il fallait... N'est-ce pas ? » {n}Vous ne savez pas si cette question vous est vraiment destinée.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae steht bei den Leichen ihrer Untergebenen – viele wurden bis zur Unkenntlichkeit verstümmelt, als hätte ein Trupp erfahrener Folterknechte sie über viele Stationszyklen malträtiert Jae umklammert das Mercatum Tabula Officiale in ihrer rechten Hand, und das Pergament knirscht protestierend.{/n} "Es war richtig, so zu handeln ... oder nicht?" {n}Du weißt nicht, ob Jae sich selbst fragt oder dich.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae stands over the bodies of her underlings — many of them have been mutilated beyond recognition, as though a troop of expert torturers had worked on them for many station cycles. Jae grips the Mercatum Tabula Officiale in her right hand and the parchment crunches in protest.{/n} "It was the right thing to do... Wasn't it?" {n}You cannot tell if Jae is asking herself or you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae steht bei den Leichen ihrer Untergebenen – viele wurden bis zur Unkenntlichkeit verstümmelt, als hätte ein Trupp erfahrener Folterknechte sie über viele Stationszyklen malträtiert Jae umklammert das Mercatum Tabula Officiale in ihrer rechten Hand, und das Pergament knirscht protestierend.{/n} "Es war richtig, so zu handeln ... oder nicht?" {n}Du weißt nicht, ob Jae sich selbst fragt oder dich.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae, astlarının bedenlerinin başında duruyor. Çoğu, sanki bir grup işkence uzmanının istasyon döngülerince gösterdiği uğraş sonucu parçalanıp tanınmaz hâle getirilmiş. Jae, Mercatum Tabula Officiale'yi sağ eliyle kavrıyor, parşömen hışırdıyor.{/n} "Doğru olan buydu... Değil mi?" {n}Kendine mi yoksa sana mı soruyor, anlamıyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae stands over the bodies of her underlings — many of them have been mutilated beyond recognition, as though a troop of expert torturers had worked on them for many station cycles. Jae grips the Mercatum Tabula Officiale in her right hand and the parchment crunches in protest.{/n} "It was the right thing to do... Wasn't it?" {n}You cannot tell if Jae is asking herself or you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae, astlarının bedenlerinin başında duruyor... Çoğu, sanki bir grup işkence uzmanının istasyon döngülerince süren çalışmasıyla parçalanıp tanınmaz hâle getirilmiş. Jae, Mercatum Tabula Officiale'yi sağ eliyle kavrıyor ve parşömen hışırdıyor.{/n} "Doğru olan buydu... Değil mi?" {n}Kendine mi yoksa sana mı soruyor anlamıyorsun.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
